If people think they’re “paying for someone else,” they’ll dismantle their own healthcare.

This is the richest country on Earth and we have:

-40 million in poverty
-34 million with no health insurance
-Half our people living paycheck to paycheck

I refuse to accept that as normal.

The future of our nation rests in the hands of our teachers. And too many teachers are leaving the profession because they can’t make ends meet. 

We need to give them a raise and pay them their value.
